mapper.insert: insert into MemberClass(id,memberId,classId) values((select ifnull(max(cast(id as unsigned)),0) + 1 from MemberClass c),#{param1}, #{param2});
mapper.select: select classId from MemberClass where memberId = #{id}
select memberName from MemberClassView where classId=#{classId};
select className, classOpenDate from MemberClassView where memberId=#{sessionId};
